analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose this rule because it contradicts the principles codified in the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. §§ 2101–2301), which mandates merit-based hiring and protection from political influence.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its contradiction to established merit-based hiring principles and protections against political influence, indicating a strong stance against the potential politicization of the civil service.
